title: Mouse pointer does not scale when remote = 1080p, client = 4K (200% DPI)
author: HubKing
body_snippet:
My client monitor is 4K. I use 200% DPI. If I set "Fullscreen" like below, the server's screen becomes 1080p. That is fine because 4K would be slower, but the problem is that the mouse pointer remains unscaled.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10900489/167331538-7d832cf7-2337-4b02-9f6c-087e6c49c5a9.png)

PS: If I disable "Automatic Resize", which makes the remote resolution 4K, I think, the cursor is still the same as when "Automatic Size" is enabled.
